values: The Invincible Power of Joy for World Missions: For Cowards, Consumers, and the ComfortableThe Invincible Power of Joy for World Missions: For Cowards, Consumers, and the Comfortable

Safety tempts us to stay put. Luxury tries to lure us. Comfort wants to keep us. But God has a bigger, global dream for his people. John Piper preached this message at the G3 2019 conference in Atlanta.Safety tempts us to stay put. Luxury tries to lure us. Comfort wants to keep us. But God has a bigger, global dream for his people. John Piper preached this message at the G3 2019 conference in Atlanta.
